context.env.Label: Environment Label
context.env.Description: Optional. The environment label you wish to apply to this deployment, eg 'test', 'prod' etc. Can be any short string.

context.hostedZoneId.Label: Hosted Zone ID
context.hostedZoneId.Description: Name of an existing hosted zone

context.hostName.Label: Subdomain
context.hostName.Description: String to prepend to the domain name to form the fully qualified domain name.

context.allowedIpV4AddressRanges.Label: Inbound IPv4 range
context.allowedIpV4AddressRanges.Description: The IP address range that will connect to GenU (defaults to your external IP)

context.modelRegion.Label: Model Region
context.modelRegion.Description: The Region where the models you are using are located.

context.modelIds.Label: Text Generation Models
context.modelIds.Description: Models to allow access to for text use-cases

context.imageGenerationModelIds.Label: Image Generation Models
context.imageGenerationModelIds.Description: Models to allow access to for image use-cases

context.videoGenerationModelIds.Label: Video Generation Models
context.videoGenerationModelIds.Description: Models to allow access to for video use-cases

context.speechToSpeechModelIds.Label: Speech Generation Models
context.speechToSpeechModelIds.Description: Models to allow access to for speech use-cases

context.crossAccountBedrockRoleArn.Label: Bedrock Role ARN
context.crossAccountBedrockRoleArn.Description: Optional - if you have a specific IAM role you wish to use, otherwise one will be created for you.
